jump_scares.spoiler: David is knocked down by a werewolf which then begins to attack Jack
The werewolf attacks David
During a dream sequence, a naked David jumps on a deer and begins eating it
During another dream sequence, Jack suddenly opens his eyes and growls at Nurse Alex
A man opens the front door and is gunned down by some strange looking mutants
Nurse Alex opens the curtains and is attacked by a mutant
David adjusts the bathroom mirror and sees un-dead Jack in the reflection
A werewolf jumps out and attacks a young couple
The scene abruptly cuts to a telephone ringing
There is a close up of the werewolf’s face and a loud growling noise before the scene cuts to a train
The scene abruptly cuts to a lion roaring at a zoo
A man is attacked by a werewolf in the movie theater
The werewolf bursts through the door to the movie theater
The werewolf roars and is repeatedly shot
Hank jumps at Abby from the side
After Hank says “you should get that thing off him before he floats away” there is a car horn blast and a cut to Hank firing a gun
As Abby is pulling the hammock there is a cut to Hank falling out of bed
The trap Hank set suddenly goes off
As Hank’s gunshot lights up the area the monster is seen kneeling on the ground
While Hank is singing, the monster suddenly lunges at him
A deadite jumps out of the water behind Ash
A deadite comes out of the wall
Ash shoots Arthur’s sword out of his hand
A woman turns around to reveal she is a deadite
The deadite woman suddenly jumps up
The Necronomicon bites Ash as he reaches out to pick it up
Ash fires his shotgun
Possessed Sheila jumps on Ash
The girl in the store turns around to reveal she is a deadite
Bee gets scared by Greg climbing up the stairs
As Bee is looking around, David suddenly throws his body against the window behind her
After being woken up by Alice, Greg’s sudden move scares the group of girls
Sophie hugs Bee from behind
An emergency vehicle rushes past
A woman’s face appears through shelving
A woman grabs Chris from behind
A zombie man jumps into frame
The camera pans back to Jonathan. A zombie screams beside Him
A zombie grabs man from the shadows
A scarab scuttles across the frame as the woman looks over the bed
Brief flashes to a car while Elvis is in bed
Scarab jumps suddenly at Elvis
Scarab jumps out of the bowl
Several cuts to photos as Elvis enters the room accompanied by a sound effect
Elvis is woken up by a hand grabbing him with a sound effect
The nurse turns and a man in standing right behind her
Bubba Ho-Tep attacks Elvis from behind the tree
Bubba Ho-Tep steps into frame
Patriot grabs Shelly’s pigtail and it comes right off to reveal a bloody patch on her scalp. A few seconds later Shelly turns around and lunges at Patriot
Shelly lunges at another student in the playground
A hand appears on the door of the nurses office
Wade bursts into the staff room, startling the other teachers
A group of infected students appear in front of the window behind Rebekkah
An infected student jumps up from the back seat to grab the policeman
Wade opens the staff room door and an infected student is standing right behind it
A teacher appears from around a corner
The lights suddenly cut out
There is some loud banging as the children attempt to break into the room where the teachers are hiding
Lucy grabs Clint around the ankle while he is crawling through the ventilation duct
An infected child puts his hand on the grate over the ventilation duct
The vending machine makes a noise, causing the nearby infected child to scream
An infected child reaches into the car and grabs Clint
Doug turns a torch on and his face suddenly appears on screen, scaring the others
Chrissy starts screaming
There is a loud thud
Chrissy screams and scares Shawn
When Shawn moves the tablet down, Mildred’s face is behind it
The creature under the bedsheets suddenly lurches towards Shawn
Shawn moves the sheets and Mildred is underneath them
There is a loud crash outside the car
A hand breaks through the car window behind Shawn
A man’s hand comes out of the bathtub and strangles Shawn
The man explodes
Mildred comes down from the ceiling
Shawn screams when he sees a “stick man” nearby
Shawn screams at a hanging coat
There is a loud thud
A possessed Linda pops up in front of Ash
Ash lifts his head out of a puddle and screams, showing that he is possessed himself
A zombified hand comes out of the ground
Zombie Linda appears at the window as Ash looks out
Linda’s head falls into Ash’s lap
Headless Linda bursts into the shed holding a chainsaw
Ash sees himself in the mirror  the mirror Ash comes out of the mirror and grabs him
The scene abruptly cuts to Ash’s possessed hand
Ash stabs his own hand with a knife
Jake jumps at Ash
Possessed Henrietta bursts through the cellar floor
Henrietta’s horribly contorted face pokes through the cellar door
Ed is possessed and screams from behind Annie
There is a loud roaring noise
Jake and Bobby Joe break through a door
A possessed tree roars at Bobby Joe
Ash becomes possessed once more and lets out a roar
Possessed Ash appears at the cabin door
Possessed Ash appears at a window
Henrietta pops out of the cellar door and drags Jake into the cellar
Annie walks into possessed Ash
Ash ducks out of the way as Annie swings an axe at him
The skeleton of Jake appears beside Ash
Henrietta grabs Ash through the cellar stairs
Henrietta rises up out of a hole in the floor
There is a loud boom and a tree branch falls on the cabin
The physical incarnation of evil appears in the cabin doorway
Roses’s car runs into a deer
Accompanied by a high pitch piano note, Georgina can be seen walking past the hallway in the background of the shot
Accompanied by a sound effect, Chris spies Georgina looking out from a window in the house
Accompanied by a high pitch piano note, Georgina turns around and looks at Chris
During a tense scene, Chris closes a door to reveal Rose is watching him
After a long period of silence Chris suddenly runs at Dean and attacks him
As Chris goes to leave, Jeremy runs up and grabs him from behind
Chris drives into Georgina
The side mirror beside Chris is suddenly blown off by a gunshot
Accompanied by a sound effect, Chris turns to the side and sees Rose looking at him
Wee wakes up to a bunch of medical dolls standing in the room
The nurses tell the story of a man who died in the ER, with third degree burns. While they talk, pictures and short unsettling clips show up accompanied by loud noises
A security guard trips and falls over a metal tray cart during a tense and quiet scene
The dead man turns toward the camera and growls as Wee snaps a picture with his phone
When young Gla closes the fridge door there’s a doll sitting behind it, with sudden eerie music
Young Gla’s father suddenly appears close to the camera with a loud sound
A loud thud when Wee accidentally walks into some boxes
The wheelchair is right in front of them when they turn their camera
An echoing thud as the third wheelchair crashes into the first two
Things start falling down from the shelves and furniture moves by itself, accompanied with eerie music
A quick flashback of the first ghost encounter is shown in a way less intense moment
The laptop opens up by itself
While Wee is screaming at the ghost of Gla, the elevator shakes and the light turns off, with a loud bang
The elevator makes a loud sudden noise
The lights break as Wee removes Mai’s shirt
Wee is thrown away from Mai’s body
There’s a loud clatter as the whiteboard starts to move on its own
During a silent moment there’s a fast camera movement to suddenly show an angry Gla appearing in front of Wee, followed by a loud bang
The paper cutter is thrown against Wee
A medical doll appears behind Wee accompanied by a loud noise as its head falls off
During this scene, Wee is thrown against the wall 2 times, as well as thrown up into the air while the room spins around
Gla appears and pushes Wee
The body in the body bag next to Wee suddenly rises up
When Wee turns around to film the body of Gla, his face has turned demonic
A man is thrown out of a bedroom
Ed is surprised by a cardboard cut-out
While skateboarding down the street, Ed is suddenly pushed over by Mark
While hiding from Mark, Ed turns around and runs straight into Jerry
Charley looks through a peephole in a door and a hand suddenly appears
Doris suddenly explodes into ash as she leaves the house
A motorbike breaks through the back window of the car causing Amy to scream
Jerry attacks the security guard
Amy screams and disappears from view
Charley bumps into Peter
A hooded person wearing a mask drops down behind Tree
Tree turns around and the masked killer is standing in the doorway
The masked killer can now be seen in the mirror standing behind Tree
The television turns back on as Tree approaches the shower curtain
The masked killer appears from behind Tree
The lights in the hospital turn back on and Tree’s professor (Gregory) is now standing beside Carter
Gregory opens a door, startling Tree as she tries to sneak down the hospital hallway, seconds later the masked killer appears behind Gregory
The police officer is suddenly hit by a car as he listens to his Walkie-talkie
The small grabber jumps up after Lisa asks “is it dead?” and then attacks the group
The camera pans back and reveals Danny standing in the doorway
Jim sees Mrs Hooper hanging from the ceiling
During a dream Roger is having, an arm comes up out of the ground beside a child
Roger opens a closet door and a monster attacks him
Harold appears by the door of Roger’s room
Sandy bends down to pick a bullet up off the floor, when she stands up she has been replaced by a monster
Roger opens the closet door and the monster is there
A tentacle comes out of the medicine cabinet hole and attacks Roger
A flying skeletal monster jumps out at Roger
The flying monster attacks Roger once more
Roger opens the front door and the skeleton of Big Ben is standing there
Big Ben comes out of a doorway and attacks Roger
Anton’s mother looks up in bed and sees writing on the ceiling causing her to scream
The cat jumps onto the bed and yowls, startling Anton’s mother
Accompanied by a loud sound effect, the camera cuts to a close up of two bodies with Jack-o’-lantern heads
A hand grabs Anton’s mother and pulls her under the bed
Anton is suddenly tackled by two policemen
The silhouette of a figure appears on the other side of a window
Mick and Knub surprise Anton
A hand bursts out of the ground and grabs Anton
The hand suddenly grabs the head of the band’s singer
The hand grabs Tanya
A clown jumps out of the pizza box
A bunch of tiny clown heads come out of the laundry hamper
The principal suddenly closes the blinds as Gary stares at Lucas
Karl startles Gary by putting his hand on Gary’s back
Gary closes the fridge door to reveal Lucas sitting on the kitchen table
When Gary looks back at the swing Lucas is gone (this is accompanied by a loud sound effect)
Accompanied by a sound effect, Gary suddenly shines the torch into an empty room
One of the toys in Lucas’s room begins talking
Gary looks through a hole int he door and the goat puppet suddenly appears
There are three quick cuts to The Reaper ferociously cutting a pot plant accompanied by heavy metal music
Towers smashes the television screen with his golf club
Reggie’s coworker opens the door, followed by a cut to a zombified man attacking him
Reggie turns around to leave and the zombified man suddenly jumps up from behind some boxes
A man reaches out to Daniel from behind after Daniel hides his brother in a closet
While kissing Alex, Grace looks up at the mirror and sees Aunt Helene watching them
As Grace peers out into the hallway, a hand suddenly grabs her around the mouth and pulls her back
As the maid calls out for Georgie, she is suddenly shot in the head
A maid is suddenly shot in the mouth with an arrow
Tony suddenly stands up and hits Alex over the head
Grace opens the elevator and sees a maid hiding in there
Grace picks up the torch and shines it on a goat
As Grace rests on the steering wheel, she looks up just as Stevens appears by the window
Various characters suddenly explode over the next couple of minutes
A chair is thrown through the window
Casey looks in the window as a masked man turns around
Sidney peers out of the window as Billy pops up
A masked man comes out of the door behind Sidney
Billy climbs through the window
Sidney opens front door to Deputy Dewey holding the killer’s mask. [Video]
Principal Himbry closes the door revealing the masked man standing behind it
Gale turns around and almost runs into Deputy Dewey
Some tools fall down
Billy suddenly appears
The masked man grabs Sidney’s arm
Randy pops up beside Gale’s window
Kenny’s dead body slides off the roof onto the windscreen
The masked man pops up from the back-seat behind Sidney
Billy opens the door and Randy bursts in
Randy grabs Sidney while she is kneeling on the floor
Billy punches Randy
A dead looking Billy reaches out his hand suddenly
Sidney’s father falls out of the closet

movies.title: Scream 6
directors: Matt Bettinelli and Olpin Tyler Gillett

jump_scares.spoiler: After a moment of silence, children scream at a distance, startling Laura
Ghostface rushes from the shadows to stab Laura
Ghostface suddenly fires a random shot in the store
The music makes a loud sound when Ghostface turns around
The shape behind the window punches trough the glass to attack the psychiatrist
Right after Mindy says “run”, Quinn’s corpse burst out of her room
Accompanied by a sound effect, Mindy finds a dead man in her bathroom, shortly after, ghostface barges in the room
Just after the killer says “you’re not gonna be able to stop this” on the phone, Ghostface drops the body of Gale’s lover on the floor
Ethan touches Mindy’s shoulder with a clear lack of manner
A man with a ghostface costume jumps in front of the camera
The light flickers, then the killer appears in front of Mindy
Sam’s phone suddenly rings during a quiet scene
Ghostface stabs Tara
Ethan, back from the dead, runs into the room screaming
Ghostface quickly flashes on screen before the credits roll
Ghostface rushes trough the door
Nelson startles Shaun as he is looking at the paper
Noel surprises Shaun
Shaun walks into Yvonne
Shaun and Ed turn around and see another zombie in the back yard
Pete’s hand reaches out from behind the shower curtain
Barbara bursts into the lounge startling Shaun
A zombie appears behind Phillip
Shaun looks back at Phillip who has now turned into a zombie
Shaun’s group runs into another group of survivors
Shaun and a zombie break through the fence
A zombie puts his hand on David’s shoulder
The zombies break the window that David is standing in front of
A zombified Ed leans down and attempts to eat Shaun’s arm
A hand grabs Jude after he opens the door
The counselor jumps out from behind a gravestone and punches Jude
June jumps on Jude from a tree branch
June turns on a light switch and it causes a lamp to explode
As the kids are walking away a flashlight suddenly turns on in front of their faces
Wallace grabs June’s hair
As Jude looks towards Eric it suddenly cuts away to Eric jumping at him
A deer flies through the car window, shattering it
The main character, Mara, leans down from her desk and a few seconds later an explosion happens right off screen, splattering the room with blood
While driving, one of the drug dealers suddenly explodes
The student at the front of the classroom suddenly explodes

movies.title: Stay Out Of The F**king Attic

jump_scares.spoiler: A hand hits the floor and a scream is heard
As they open the door a box falls down
A basketball hits Cole in the head as the title credits show on the screen
The camera pans around to reveal Bee watching Cole as he attempts to jump out the window
Cole backs into Sam’s corpse
Sonya slams her fist into some couragated iron near where Cole is hiding
Max is suddenly behind Cole
There is a loud sound effect as Cole bumps into something (but it’s only a potplant)
Alison grabs Cole around the leg
Alison is suddenly shot in the head (with gory results)
The title card appears abruptly on the screen accompanied by a scream. [Video]
The gas station attendant suddenly appears in front of Holden
Holden removes a painting from the wall to reveal a window with Dana standing behind it
The cellar door opens by itself
Jules is stabbed in the hand while having sex
An agitated Curt suddenly appears beside Marty
Something punches through the cabin wall
A zombie breaks through the window and grabs Marty
A zombie hand comes through the window in Dana’s room
Holden is stabbed in the back by a zombie
Holden is stabbed in the neck while driving
The father zombie bangs his chain down in front of Dana
Dana puts her face up to a window and a werewolf lunges at the glass from the other side. [Video]
A ghost flies out of the ground and towards the camera
A hand suddenly appears out of the bathroom mirror
Magda’s ghost springs upwards behind Frank
Ray’s ghost suddenly runs into the room behind Lucy
Ray’s ghost drops onto Lucy’s car from above
Lucy moves away from the window to reveal Milton standing behind her
The ghost of Bartlett walks behind Lucy with a sound cue
Milton suddenly appears behind some wooden boards
Milton jumps out of the door behind Lucy
An explosion in the sand scares rick
As Evy is searching where a sound comes from a skeleton pops up with a very loud sound effect (but it turns out to be a joke from Jonathan)
Rick throws a bag on the table scaring Evy
When Evy comes up from picking her brush, Hook from the Medjai is suddenly behind her
When Rick and the group turns around the group of Americans are pointing guns at them
A mild jump scare when Jonathan suddenly takes his hand out of his bag
When Rick and Jonathan first open Imhotep’s sarcophagus, his wet corpse pops out
When Evy reads from the book of the dead Imhotep´s corpse suddenly wakes up and lets out a roar
A shadow suddenly passes by
The ground suddenly shakes
A hand pops out of the ground
Mr. Daniels checks the window and suddenly a sandstorm blows towards him
When Rick decapitates a mummy, the mummy holds his head and Rick then slams the sword to the head causing the mummy´s head to fly towards the screen
Anck Su Namun pops up behind Rick and Evy

During a flashback, a sock puppet briefly appears on screen accompanied by an electronic noise that may startle some viewers

A teenage boy turns around and a machete blade is driven into his head
Lowell head butts McKayla

After switching the lights back on, Syl turns around and a masked person is standing behind her

Sadie clobbers Big Al with a baseball bat as he talks to McKayla

As the back door is opened, Trisha is there
